current_date = Sys.Date()

fukyou <- function() {
  #hepl https://api.nasa.gov/planetary/apod?api_key=DEMO_KEY&date=2014-10-01&concept_tags=True
  newurl = paste0("https://api.nasa.gov/planetary/apod?api_key=", myAPI, "&date=", current_date)
  res = GET(newurl)
  resultie <<- fromJSON(rawToChar(res$content))
}
fukyou()

if (resultie[[1]] == "400") {
  current_date = current_date - 5
  fukyou()
} else if (resultie$media_type != "image") {
  current_date = current_date - 3
  fukyou()
}
attach(resultie)
resultie
tags$body(tags$img(src = resultie$hdurl))

background_url = resultie$hdurl
